DOC.brief_summary: This study aim investigate effect early intervention ( joint observation video feedback ) maternal parent self-efficacy follow premature birth . Mothers give birth premature baby randomly allocate either early intervention usual care whilst infant still hospitalize . Participants follow one month six month . It predict participant receive early intervention report high maternal parent self-efficacy .
DOC.brief_title: An Early Intervention Increase Maternal Self-efficacy After Preterm Birth
DOC.criteria: Mothers preterm infant bear 28 32 week gestation Infant age 8 week Do speak French sufficiently well participate assessment Have establish intellectual disability psychotic illness Infant instable regard hemodynamic respiratory functioning ( severe brady apnea , 30 % oxygen )
